Package it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers

Class ObservableGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObservableObject
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObservableGame
Direct Known Subclasses:
Game
public class ObservableGame
extends ObservableObject
This class is the class that represent the Observer pattern used in Distributed MVC pattern used to create Santorini's video game, it is a class that represent a game that can be observer from ObserverRemoteView to gain information about the change of the game state using Observer pattern.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<ObserverRemoteView> rvObs  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ObservableGame()
    Creates and observable game with a list of ObserverRemoteView ready to be changed.

      addObserver in class ObservableObject
      Parameters:
      obs - is the observer
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the obs parameter is null or is already an observer of this object

    • notifyPositions

      public void notifyPositions​(Map netMap, boolean finished) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      It notifies all the ObserverRemoteView observers that the gaming map changed having 2 more workers on it.
      Parameters:
      netMap - is the gaming map
      finished - carries the information if the positioning phase is finished or not
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if netMap is null

    • notifyPossibleActions

      public void notifyPossibleActions​(java.util.List<Move> moves, java.util.List<Build> builds) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      It notifies all the ObserverRemoteView observers that the active player can perform moves specified in moves and builds specified in builds for the current game phase.
      Parameters:
      moves - is a list of the possible moves
      builds - is a list of the possible builds
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if moves or builds are null

    • notifyPhaseChange

      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if turn is null

    • notifyEndForDisconnection

      public void notifyEndForDisconnection()
      It notifies all the ObserverRemoteView observers that a player has disconnected during the setup of the game and for this reason the game is finished.
